title: Over-the-counter pills and promises
creator_credit: Lee Rhoads, Alfred Higgins and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Shows that highly advertised over-the-counter medicines may not offer the best values and that less expensive brands and home remedies are often just as effective.
